header.welcomeSubtitle: We are a leading logistics and supply chain management company based in Tema, Ghana. We specialize in shipping, import/export, and general goods handling — providing efficient, reliable, and customized solutions for global trade.
header.importSubtitle: We handle the seamless importation of vehicles, equipment and heavy-duty machinery with speed, care and professionalism.
header.contactSubtitle: Have a question or need a custom quote?

footer.description: Logistics & Supply Chain company based in Tema, Ghana. We specialize in shipping, import/export, and general goods handling.

about.title: About Ter Maximum Ltd
about.p1: Ter Maximum Ltd is a logistics and supply chain management company based in Tema, Ghana. We specialize in providing comprehensive solutions to meet the needs of our clients in the maritime and logistics sectors.
about.p2: With our experienced team and strategic location near the port, we are well-equipped to handle a wide range of logistics challenges. Our services include freight forwarding, customs clearance, warehousing, and distribution, ensuring that your goods are managed efficiently from origin to destination.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.description: We provide ocean freight, air freight, and land transportation services tailored to your logistics needs.

importExport.title: Import & Export
importExport.description: Customs clearance, cargo insurance, and freight forwarding handled with compliance and efficiency.

generalGoods.title: General Goods
generalGoods.description: Procurement, secure storage, and distribution of general goods across multiple sectors.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We operate with transparency and honesty.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: We prioritize our clients' needs and satisfaction.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously improve our processes and services.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: We collaborate to achieve common goals.

weImport.title: Efficient. Reliable. Global.
weImport.p1: We specialize in seamless customs clearing and forwarding for automobiles, heavy machinery, and other import categories. Whether it's one vehicle or an entire fleet, we handle the process with care and precision.
weImport.p2: With years of experience in the logistics industry, our team guarantees safe, timely, and efficient delivery of your imports from any global port.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Proven track record in logistics and supply chain management across multiple sectors.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: A knowledgeable and dedicated team ensuring the best service quality for every client.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Tailored logistics solutions designed to meet your specific business needs and goals.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Timely, secure and traceable delivery processes that give you peace of mind.

strategicLocation.title: Strategic Location
strategicLocation.description: Located near Tema Port, we reduce delays and cut logistics costs significantly.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Our services are built around your satisfaction, ensuring consistent quality at every step.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide exceptional service, build lasting relationships, and consistently exceed our clients' expectations through efficient, reliable, and cost-effective logistics solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading global provider of shipping and logistics services, recognized for exceptional service, reliability, and continuous innovation while fostering sustainable growth, customer satisfaction, and employee excellence.
